name: Magpie (Loremm, sloonzz, nsontillano, jonhans123)
description:
Our entry for BOSS RUSH JAM 2023.

You are a Magpie possessed by a mystical Magnet. You two must find a way out of this wasteland.

Project is still very much a work in progress. There are still some planned updates once the Judging is complete.

Hope you have fun!

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to Dash

Left Click for Melee Attack

Hold Right Click to Charge Range Attack

Left Click (while Charging) to Power Up Your Range Attack; time your clicks when the bar becomes purple, avoid making the bar red.

Release Right Click to Fire Charged Attack

Left Shift to expand Magnetic Field

Alt + F4 to close (sorry about that)
